The Challenge Network / Society
T.C.STIVAL!
{!Contact.FirstName}
A festival style event to celebrate you and prove that you're not going to become another youth statistic!
Up for some creativity? Got a competitive streak? Fancy learning some key employable skills? If the answer is yes then join us for the most exciting event this April! Prizes to be won including an all expenses trip to the Alps. Goody bags and festival treats for all attendees and so much more...
Non Challengers are welcome so bring along your friends (as long as they're between 14-19 years old), just text 07557 747549 to bag them a space.
Where? Queens Road, Baptist Church, Coventry When? Friday 20th April 11.30am - 4.30am Travel? Mini-buses will be leaving from Solihull train station and Leamington Spa train station to bring you to the venue and back.
If you're walking from Coventry centre, head towards the Skydome (Ikea) and it's on the other side of the ring road behind Dragon Pheonix and Careys. If you're getting a lift and using a sat nav please use the postcode CV1 3FZ which will bring you into Grosvenor Road
SPACES ARE LIMITED SO SIGN UP TODAY AND SECURE YOUR PLACE.
WWW.THECHALLENGESOCIETY.ORG
